text: Architects is set to have a pretty massive 2025. The band just announced their new record The Sky, the Earth & All Between for February and now they've begun to roll out tour dates in support of it. Architects has announced the following European tour dates thus far, surely with more to come. The tour kicks off on March 10 at the Zenith venue in Lille, France and wraps up on March 22 at the MEO Arena in Lisbon, Portugal. html:
Architects is set to have a pretty massive 2025. The band just announced their new record The Sky, the Earth & All Between for February and now they've begun to roll out tour dates in support of it. Architects has announced the following European tour dates thus far, surely with more to come.

The tour kicks off on March 10 at the Zenith venue in Lille, France and wraps up on March 22 at the MEO Arena in Lisbon, Portugal. Get 'em below and get your tickets here.

3/10 Lille, FRA Zenith
3/11 Strasbourg, FRA Zenith
3/12 Nantes, FRA Zenith
3/14 Lyon, FRA Halle Tony Garnier
3/15 Zurich, SWI The Hall
3/18 Madrid, SPA Palacio Vistalegre
3/19 Barcelona, SPA Razzmatazz
3/22 Lisbon, POR MEO Arena
